item.title: irrational-art — Interactive Diagrams of Irrational Numbers
Teensy 4.1 Home Theater Controller — Serial + OSC + HTTPS Bridge
item.description: A Teensy 4.1 drives a full home theater: RS-232 projector/receiver/HDMI matrix, a relay for the motorized screen, and an OSC→HTTPS bridge (Python + pyvizio) for a TLS-only TV—all controllable from a custom TouchOSC layout.
